enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the class attribute of the element, making them complementary for testing class attribute manipulation.
The toggleClass method also manipulates the class attribute, providing a good basis for testing class attribute behavior.
The hasClass method can be used to verify the presence of a class before and after calling addClass, ensuring the method behaves as expected.
The classNames method can be used to retrieve the current set of classes, providing a baseline for comparison before and after adding a class.
